extension.name: KHR_fp64

contributors.contributor: Members of the WebCL working group

overview.features:
The getInfo member function in WebCLDevice will accept the additional enums specified in the IDL below.
The build member function in WebCLProgram will accept programs containing #pragma OPENCL EXTENSION cl_khr_fp64 : enable.
The doubleN datatypes can be used in WebCL kernel code.
